name: AttributionCategoryVS
description: Whether the adverse event is attributed to a treatment, course of the disease, medical error, unrelated to either, or unknown.

values.description: Adverse event is attributed to an intervention or treatment.
Adverse event is attributed to the course of the disease
Adverse event is attributed to a medical error
Adverse event is attributed to an cause unrelated to the treatment, disease, or medical error.
The causal category of the adverse event is unknown
